global.sign_in_notice: You need to {sign_in_link} to access this page

parcel_edit.set_name_and_desc: Set a name and description for {parcel_name}
parcel_edit.name: Name

parcel_transfer.irreversible: Remember that transferring LAND is an irreversible operation.
parcel_transfer.cant_transfer: This LAND can't be transferred because it's on sale.
parcel_transfer.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, the details are below.
parcel_transfer.error_persists: If the problem persists, contact us at our {community_chat_link}

parcel_buy.needs_at_least: You need at least {value} in order to buy this LAND.
parcel_buy.please_approve: Please go to {settings_link} and allow the Marketplace contract to move MANA in your behalf

parcel_publish.set_land_price: Set a price and an expiration date for {parcel_name}
parcel_publish.price_placeholder: Price in MANA for this LAND
parcel_publish.already_sold: This LAND is already on sale for {value}
parcel_publish.please_authorize: You need to go to {settings_link} and authorize the Marketplace to operate LAND on your behalf before you can list it on sale.

errors.minimum_expiration: The minimum expiration date is one day
errors.minimum_land: The minimum LAND price is {value} MANA

parcel_cancel.about_to_cancel: You are about to cancel this sale.

activity.start: You can start by approving some MANA on your {settings_link}

transaction.approved: You allowed the {marketplace_contract_link} to move all your MANA on your behalf
transaction.disapproved: You disallowed the {marketplace_contract_link} to transfer funds on your behalf
transaction.authorize: You have {action} the {marketplace_contract_link} to operate LAND on your behalf
transaction.edit: You edited {parcel_link} with the name "{name}" and description "{description}"

transaction_status.see_activity: To see your transaction history, visit your {activity_link}.

text.pending: The transaction is waiting to be confirmed.
text.failed: Your transaction failed, you can try sending a new one.

settings.unapprove_mana_check: Check to disallow the Marketplace contract to move your MANA
settings.approve_mana_check: Check to allow the Marketplace contract to move all your MANA on your behalf
settings.mana_approved: You allowed the {marketplace_contract_link} to move all your MANA on your behalf
settings.approve_mana: Allow the {marketplace_contract_link} to move all your MANA on your behalf
settings.unauthorize_land_check: Unchecking unauthorizes LAND usage for the Marketplace contract
settings.authorize_land_check: Checking authorizes LAND usage to the Marketplace contract
settings.authorize: Authorize the {marketplace_contract_link} to operate LAND on your behalf

sign_in.options: Download {metamask_link} or {mist_link} or access with your {ledger_nano_link} link to use the Marketplace.
sign_in.account_unlocked: Make sure your account is unlocked
